name: emojidex
title: emojidex-coffee
description: frontend emoji input, widgets and tools for web pages and apps. emojidex-coffee provides a plugin for jQuery/Zepto which enables frontend use and integration of emoji. Use emoji in text fields, icons and inline graphics. Simply include the compiled javascript and all assets are dynamically loaded from the emojidex service.

author.name: Genshin Souzou Kabushiki Kaisha [幻信創造株式会社]
